amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enter into contracts with entities who have been convicted of fraud.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into contracts with entities who have been convicted of fraud.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
